channel.title: kvm on seteuid0's blog
channel.description: Recent content in kvm on seteuid0's blog

item.title: Run macOS on QEMU/KVM
item.description: 有需要跑macOS，遂找资料进行下初期的技术验证。看了一些网页后大多都基于https://github.com/kholia/OSX-KVM 来做，简单验证流程如下： 使用fedora30系统（系统运行qemu的操作省略）``` git clone https://github.com/kholia/OSX-KVM.git cd OSX-KVM ./fetch-macOS.py ProductID Version Build Post Date Title 1 041-91758 10.13.6 17G66 2019-10-19 macOS High Sierra 2 041-88800 10.14.4 18E2034 2019-10-23 macOS Mojave 3 061-26589 10.14.6 18G103 2019-10-14 macOS Mojave 4 061-10700 10.15.2 19C57 2019-12-10 macOS Catalina 5 041-90855 10.13.5 17F66a 2019-10-23 Install macOS High Sierra Beta 6 061-26578 10.14.5 18F2059 2019-10-14 macOS Mojave 7 061-44345 10.15.2 19C39d 2019-11-15 macOS Catalina Beta Choose a product to download (1-7): 2
